title: Walk-in Interview for Assistant Professor (Computer Science)
description: Applications are invited for the post of Assistant Professor in Computer Science & Engineering department. Candidates with Ph.D. or pursuing Ph.D. in relevant area with good academic record may apply. Experience in teaching and research will be preferred.

title: Recruitment for Technical Assistant (Electronics)
description: Walk-in interview for the post of Technical Assistant in Electronics & Communication Engineering department. Candidates must have B.Tech/Diploma in Electronics with minimum 60% marks. Hands-on experience in lab management preferred.

title: Assistant Professor - Mechanical Engineering
description: Applications invited for Assistant Professor position in Mechanical Engineering. Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering with specialization in Thermal/Manufacturing/Design. Minimum 2 years teaching experience required.

title: Lab Instructor - Computer Science
description: Recruitment for Lab Instructor in Computer Science department. M.Tech/MCA with good programming skills. Experience in managing computer labs and knowledge of latest technologies preferred.

title: Librarian Position
description: Applications are invited for the post of Librarian. Candidates must have Master's degree in Library Science with minimum 5 years experience. Knowledge of digital library management systems mandatory.

title: Sports Officer
description: Recruitment for Sports Officer. Candidates must have Bachelor's degree in Physical Education with National/State level sports achievements. Coaching certification will be an added advantage.
